solution_line_template: After taking in {incoming_dogs} more dogs, the number of dogs in the rescue center increased to {initial_dogs}+{incoming_dogs} = {after_incoming}.
After a week, the number of dogs was reduced to {after_incoming} - {adopted_first} = <<{after_incoming}-{adopted_first}={after_first_adoption}>>{after_first_adoption} after the adoptions.
So, there are {after_first_adoption} - {adopted_second} = {remaining_dogs} dogs left after {adopted_second} more dogs were adopted.
